subject: Re: [Request received] Update Website Listing - Canopy NZ
preview: Hi Alyssa,  Thanks for following up on this one!  I’m happy to confirm that the New Zealand location updates have been pushed to the live site as well.  You can see the new Canopy Imaging listing, t

full_threads.body:
Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for following up on this one!

I’m happy to confirm that the New Zealand location updates have been pushed to the live site as well.

You can see the new Canopy Imaging listing, the updated side navigation, and the revised text live here:
  • Find a Treatment Centre: https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre/

Everything is set up just as requested. Let me know if there is anything else I can help with!

Done putting changes to live site

(time:40min)
@adriane
-Whil

##- Please type your reply above this line -##


Your request (#30809) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below:
https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30809



Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

14 Jan 2026, 11:09 GMT+11

Hi team,

Just wanted to follow up on this one as well.

Any updates would be appreciated.

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018



WolfIQ Support

9 Jan 2026, 17:12 GMT+11

Hi Jenn,

Thank you for confirming this as well!

We'll start rolling the approved updates live with the other confirmation. We'll also keep you posted once done.

Warmly,
Adriane Roa
support@wolfiq.com.au

Give a friend $1,000 towards their success.
• Know a business owner who could use some help with their website?
• Reply and CC them on this email (or just forward it along).
• We'll apply a $1,000 credit to any Annual Care Plan they subscribe to

Learn more about our Referral Program here.
_____________________________
{#HS:3167984771-181871#}

Hi Jenn,

Thank you for confirming this as well!

We’ll start rolling the approved updates live with the other confirmation. We'll also keep you posted once done.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa

WolfIQ Support, 19 Dec 2025, 11:58 GMT+11

Hi Alyssa,

Apologies for the delay in getting back to you.

We are happy to confirm that all updates for the New Zealand location have been completed and are ready for your review on the Staging site.

**You can view the updates here:** https://stg-oncobeta-stg.kinsta.cloud/find-a-treatment-centre/

**We have completed the following:**

- Updated the subtitle text under "New Zealand".
- Created the Canopy Imaging listing with full details and the optimized photo.
- Updated the side navigation to show "Hawkes Bay".
- Positioned the entire section correctly below the Australia listings.

Please take a look and let us know if it is approved. Thank you!



Warmly,
**Adriane Roa**
support@wolfiq.com.au
![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)

• Our office will be closed Monday, 22 Dec and returning on Monday, 5 January
• Wolf IQ Support will continue to be available for anything urgent (just send us an email)

**Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...**
✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star **Google reviews**
✔ Launch **landing pages** for new marketing campaigns
✔ Run **digital health checks** on your online presence
✔ See what your visitors really want with **website heatmaps**

Just **reply to this email** with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).

**About your Care Plan**
• Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month.
• Essentials – 15 minutes / Pro – 120 minutes / Expert – 300 minutes.
• Additional is billed at $147/hr (ex GST) at the end of the month.
• Anything else we can help with? Start a new email—it helps us move faster and serve you better.
_____________________________

WolfIQ Support, 12 Dec 2025, 14:43 GMT+11

Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for the clear brief - very helpful.

We’ve reviewed the requested updates for adding the New Zealand location on the _Find a Treatment Centre_ page. Please see the time estimates below so you can share them with the client for approval.

### **Proposed Updates & Estimates**
**1. Update the copy under “New Zealand”**
Change text to: “Treatment currently available across New Zealand.”
**Estimate:** ~5 mins
**2. Add new treatment location (Canopy Imaging) under New Zealand**

- Replicate existing Australia-style treatment listing
- Add new clinic section and integrate into the existing structure
**Estimate:** ~30 mins
**3. Update side navigation**

- Replace multiple NZ entries with a single item: “Hawkes Bay”
- Ensure navigation anchors correctly
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**4. Add clinic details for Canopy Imaging**

- Insert full address, practitioner, and centre information
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**5. Add and optimise clinic image**

- Upload, resize/optimise, and insert into the location layout
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**6. Position the new NZ section below the Australia listings**

- Ensure styling and spacing align with existing design
**Estimate:** ~10 mins


### **Total Estimated Time:** **~1 hr 15 mins**
Let us know once the client approves and we’ll proceed with implementation on Staging. Happy to assist with the quick turnaround for next week’s deployment.

Always here to help.



Warmly,
**Adriane Roa**
support@wolfiq.com.au
![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)

• Our office will be closed Monday, 22 Dec and returning on Monday, 5 January
• Wolf IQ Support will continue to be available for anything urgent (just send us an email)

**Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...**
✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star **Google reviews**
✔ Launch **landing pages** for new marketing campaigns
✔ Run **digital health checks** on your online presence
✔ See what your visitors really want with **website heatmaps**

Just **reply to this email** with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).

**About your Care Plan**

• Essentials – 15 minutes / Pro – 120 minutes / Expert – 300 minutes.
• Additional is billed at $147/hr (ex GST) at the end of the month.

Alyssa Venturanza, 12 Dec 2025, 11:59 GMT+11

Hi team,

Can we get estimates for the following updates, please?

We want to finally add a Location here under New Zealand https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre/

Here are the changes:

1. Update the copy under ‘New Zealand’ to, **‘Treatment currently available across New Zealand’**

![](https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/ZFmzOJQAN4IkJtnr9mDHluKh0/?name=image003.png)
2. Once users click on the ‘New Zealand’ tile, we want to have Canopy Imaging as one of the treatment locations. Please replicate what we have for Australia’s treatment listing for New Zealand listing (refer below screenshot)
3. For the side navigation, since we only have one location for NZ right now, can you update so that it only has ‘Hawkes Bay’. If we ever have any additional locations in NZ we can add more to the side nav – but for now lets have the one (highlighted in red):
- ![](https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/kW0U3A1Ip9dsgQ3rkTF65c4lc/?name=image004.png)
4. Please update the clinic’s details to Canopy Imaging clinic details:
1.

> _**Hawkes Bay**_
>
> _**Canopy Imaging**_
>
> _**Molecular Imaging & Therapy Centre**_
>
>
>
> _Dr Rachelle Steyn_
>
> _4 Murray Place,_
> _Camberley_
> _Hastings 4120_
>
> _New Zealand_

_5_ . Canopy Imaging clinic image: Please use the clinic’s image (attached)
6. We can put the new section directly under the existing Australia listing. Basically, it should look something like this: https://cbo.d.pr/i/FQaxC4

Please provide estimates first before taking any action on our Staging site.

We'll make sure to let you know once we're approved to proceed.

If we can get the estimates as soon as possible as well, please, as we aim to deploy this by next week.

Thanks!

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Attachment(s):
Canopy Imaging PET CT Hastings.jpg - https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/KbXZJlidBYW4muXPr7q56wRXJ/?name=Canopy+Imaging+PET+CT+Hastings.jpg

--------------------------------
This email is a service from Combinate Support.

**Estimate:** ~5 mins
**2. Add new treatment location (Canopy Imaging) under New Zealand**

- Replicate existing Australia-style treatment listing
- Add new clinic section and integrate into the existing structure
**Estimate:** ~30 mins
**3. Update side navigation**

- Replace multiple NZ entries with a single item: “Hawkes Bay”
- Ensure navigation anchors correctly
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**4. Add clinic details for Canopy Imaging**

- Insert full address, practitioner, and centre information
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**5. Add and optimise clinic image**

- Upload, resize/optimise, and insert into the location layout
**Estimate:** ~10 mins
**6. Position the new NZ section below the Australia listings**

- Ensure styling and spacing align with existing design
**Estimate:** ~10 mins


### **Total Estimated Time:** **~1 hr 15 mins**
Let us know once the client approves and we’ll proceed with implementation on Staging. Happy to assist with the quick turnaround for next week’s deployment.

Always here to help.



Warmly,
**Adriane Roa**
support@wolfiq.com.au
![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)
**Holiday Trading 🎄🧑🎄**
• The Wolf IQ team will be taking a short break for the holidays to recharge for 2026
• Our office will be closed Monday, 22 Dec and returning on Monday, 5 January
• Wolf IQ Support will continue to be available for anything urgent (just send us an email)

**Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...**
✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star **Google reviews**
✔ Launch **landing pages** for new marketing campaigns
✔ Run **digital health checks** on your online presence
✔ See what your visitors really want with **website heatmaps**

Just **reply to this email** with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).

**About your Care Plan**
• Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month.
• Essentials – 15 minutes / Pro – 120 minutes / Expert – 300 minutes.
• Additional is billed at $147/hr (ex GST) at the end of the month.
• Anything else we can help with? Start a new email—it helps us move faster and serve you better.
_____________________________

{#HS:3167984771-181871#} ![](https://secure.helpscout.net/notification/convo/read/3167984771/9655389989/)

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to .

----------------------------------------------

Alyssa Venturanza, 12 Dec 2025, 11:59 GMT+11

Hi team,

Can we get estimates for the following updates, please?

We want to finally add a Location here under New Zealand https://www.oncobeta.com.au/find-a-treatment-centre/

Here are the changes:

1. Update the copy under ‘New Zealand’ to, **‘Treatment currently available across New Zealand’**

![](https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/ZFmzOJQAN4IkJtnr9mDHluKh0/?name=image003.png)
2. Once users click on the ‘New Zealand’ tile, we want to have Canopy Imaging as one of the treatment locations. Please replicate what we have for Australia’s treatment listing for New Zealand listing (refer below screenshot)
3. For the side navigation, since we only have one location for NZ right now, can you update so that it only has ‘Hawkes Bay’. If we ever have any additional locations in NZ we can add more to the side nav – but for now lets have the one (highlighted in red):
- ![](https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/kW0U3A1Ip9dsgQ3rkTF65c4lc/?name=image004.png)
4. Please update the clinic’s details to Canopy Imaging clinic details:
1.

> _**Hawkes Bay**_
>
> _**Canopy Imaging**_
>
> _**Molecular Imaging & Therapy Centre**_
>
>
>
> _Dr Rachelle Steyn_
>
> _4 Murray Place,_
> _Camberley_
> _Hastings 4120_
>
> _New Zealand_

_5_ . Canopy Imaging clinic image: Please use the clinic’s image (attached)
6. We can put the new section directly under the existing Australia listing. Basically, it should look something like this: https://cbo.d.pr/i/FQaxC4

Please provide estimates first before taking any action on our Staging site.

We'll make sure to let you know once we're approved to proceed.

If we can get the estimates as soon as possible as well, please, as we aim to deploy this by next week.

Thanks!

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

Attachment(s):
Canopy Imaging PET CT Hastings.jpg - https://support.combinate.me/attachments/token/KbXZJlidBYW4muXPr7q56wRXJ/?name=Canopy+Imaging+PET+CT+Hastings.jpg

This email is a service from Combinate Support.









[LE9401-GMD4J]

Hi Alyssa,

Thanks for the clear brief - very helpful.

We’ve reviewed the requested updates for adding the New Zealand location on the Find a Treatment Centre page. Please see the time estimates below so you can share them with the client for approval.

Proposed Updates & Estimates

1. Update the copy under “New Zealand”
Change text to: “Treatment currently available across New Zealand.”
Estimate: ~5 mins
2. Add new treatment location (Canopy Imaging) under New Zealand
  • Replicate existing Australia-style treatment listing
  • Add new clinic section and integrate into the existing structure
    Estimate: ~30 mins
3. Update side navigation
  • Replace multiple NZ entries with a single item: “Hawkes Bay”
  • Ensure navigation anchors correctly
    Estimate: ~10 mins
4. Add clinic details for Canopy Imaging
  • Insert full address, practitioner, and centre information
    Estimate: ~10 mins
5. Add and optimise clinic image
  • Upload, resize/optimise, and insert into the location layout
    Estimate: ~10 mins
6. Position the new NZ section below the Australia listings
  • Ensure styling and spacing align with existing design
    Estimate: ~10 mins

Total Estimated Time: ~1 hr 15 mins

Let us know once the client approves and we’ll proceed with implementation on Staging. Happy to assist with the quick turnaround for next week’s deployment.

Always here to help.
